DOC.brief_summary: This study carry see dose AZD1305 safe effective cardioverting atrial fibrillation normal heart rhythm .
DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Cardioversion Atrial Fibrillation ( AF ) With AZD1305
DOC.criteria: Clinical indication cardioversion Atrial Fibrillation , ie correction irregular heart rhythm normal heart rhythm Current episode Atrial Fibrillation ( ie irregular heart rhythm ) last 3 month randomisation Adequate anticoagulation accord international guideline ( ACC/AHA/ESC , 2006 ) national guideline Potassium level 3.8 mmol/L measure serum plasma QTcF interval > 440 m
